name: hospital bed
description: Senior stays in a rental flat and has late stage oral tongue cancer. He requires a hospital bed to adjust his sleeping position. He is financially destitute and relies on multiple financial organisations for sustenance.

name: Sofa
description: A young couple with two small children (aged 3 and 4) living in a rental flat is struggling to make ends meet. Their income is barely enough for daily necessities, leaving them with little to spare. They hope to ask for a queen-size storage bed and an L-shaped sofa as their current furniture has become unusable, making rest and comfort at home difficult. On top of that, their fridge is no longer functioning well, causing food to spoil quickly. As a result, they are often forced to eat out, further straining their already tight budget.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

passiton.name: 3 -seater sofa
passiton.description: 3 seater recliner that can recline at both ends

name: Dressing table with mirror
description: Client is a single mother with school-going child. Client has been working 2 jobs on a daily basis as much as she can, and managed to secure her first purchased flat after years of hard work. Client experiences tight finances after paying for her new flat's expenses, and would like to request for donation of dressing table with mirror to save on expenses while she moves in to her new flat. Thank you. Please WhatsApp Yin Yu at 8718 8437 or email to limyinyu@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

name: Phone
description: Client is living alone in a HDB public rental flat and is estranged from his children. He suffered a workplace injury in Jan 2025, and is on MC until end Mar 2025. He has no savings and his bank accounts were compromised in late 2024 and he has not been able to access his accounts, including government payouts. He lost his phone in late 2024 as well and does not have the money to purchase one.

passiton.name: Samsung A8 (2018) Tempered Glass Screen Protector and Phone Casing
passiton.description: Unused Tempered Glass screen protector and Casing only suitable for Samsung A8 (2018) phone.

name: Shoes
description: Hi, there is a client, facing financial difficulties who requires a pair of sports shoes and a slipper as his current ones are worn-out. He is diagnosed with mental health conditions and is certified temporarily unfit for work. He does not have familial support and is hoping to receive some support to help him tide through his financial constraints. Client's shoe size is US46. For the slipper, he hopes to receive an open-toes slipper so that there would not be friction between his toes which has caused him discomfort and injury in the past. Thank you!

passiton.name: new balance shoes for walking
passiton.description: worn in well , very comfy
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

name: Clothes
description: Hi, there is a client, facing financial difficulties who requires some pants. He is diagnosed with mental health conditions and is certified temporarily unfit for work. He does not have familial support and is hoping to receive some clothes support to help him tide through his financial constraints. Client requires pants of size US50 (long and short pants). Thank you!
